biolockj.util

Class RuntimeParamUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.util.RuntimeParamUtil

  • public class RuntimeParamUtil
extends Object
    This utility processes the application runtime parameters passed to BioLockJ.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String BASE_DIR_FLAG
      Pipeline parent directory file-path runtime parameter switch: "-b"
      static String CONFIG_DIR_FLAG
      Config file directory path runtime parameter switch: "-C"

        Runtime property getter for "-p"
        Returns:
        New clear-text password

      • getBaseDir

        public static File getBaseDir()
                       throws Exception
        Runtime property getter for "-b"
        Returns:
        $BLJ_PROJ pipeline parent directory
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

        Config file

        Pipeline directory dir
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

        Returns:

      • getDockerRuntimeArgs

        public static String getDockerRuntimeArgs()
                                   throws Exception
        Get Docker runtime arguments, passed to BioLockJ from dockblj script.
        These are used to build Docker worker scripts by the modules.
        Returns:
        Docker runtime args
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • getRestartDir

        public static File getRestartDir()
                          throws Exception
        Return restart pipeline directory
        Returns:
        File directory path
        Throws:
        Exception - if errors occur

      • isDirectMode

        public static boolean isDirectMode()
        Return TRUE if runtime parameters indicate attempt to run in direct mode
        Returns:
        boolean

      • isDockerMode

        public static boolean isDockerMode()
        Return TRUE if runtime parameter "-D" was found
        Returns:
        boolean

      • printRuntimeArgs

        public static void printRuntimeArgs(String[] args,
                                    boolean useSysOut)
        Print the runtime args to System.out or using the Logger based on useSysOut parameter.
        Parameters:
        args - Runtime Args
        useSysOut - Set TRUE if should use System.out to print

      • registerRuntimeParameters

        public static void registerRuntimeParameters(String[] args)
                                      throws Exception
        Register and verify the runtime parameters. There are 2 required parameters:
        1. The Config file path
        2. The pipeline parent directory ($DOCKER_PROJ)
        Parameters:
        args - Program runtime parameters
        Throws:
        Exception - if invalid parameters detected
